15.title: An Aesthetic Becomes Tough! Sunny's Manly Fight!

16.title: Rin, the Last Hope! Awake, Super Toriko!
16.plot:

17.title: Super Toriko, Fist of Anger! The Strongest Nail Punch!

 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: The Taste Written in His DNA! Toriko, Search for the Blue Blood Corn!
18.plot: Komatsu must find an exquisite sauce to top a dish of very rare fish, and Toriko prepares to venture deep into the deadly Wul Jungle in search of food fit for a Battle Wolf.

19.title: The Talent of Battle! Show Me, Terry, King in the Making!
19.plot: Time is running out for Komatsu to complete his fishy dish, and Toriko watches as Terry faces off against a beastly Zombie Wood. Will the Battle Wolf show his true power, or fall to his ferocious foe?

20.title: For Terry's Sake! Burst by Broiling Heat, BB Corn!
20.plot: Toriko and Terry finally find the deliciously elusive BB Corn, and Komatsu must depend on a special blend of spices to survive an encounter with a giant lizard.

21.title: The Gourmet Corps' Assassin! Toriko's Attack Instantaneously Evolves!
21.plot: Toriko must take his powers to the next level if he hopes to defeat a ravenous assassin from the Gourmet Corps. Elsewhere, Komatsu learns of the legendary ingredient with the power to stop - or start - wars. Toriko gets a new move.

22.title: Pressure of Madness! Grinpatch vs. Toriko!
22.plot: Toriko continues his battle with the corn-stealing, straw-wielding villain known as Grinpatch, and Komatsu desperately races to make it home before a rare dish of fish becomes nothing more than bubbles.

23.title: The Amusement Park of Eating! The Bellyfull City, Gourmet Town!
23.plot: Toriko and Komatsu travel to the city of culinary dreams for a special dinner with a living gourmet legend. Elsewhere, the sinister Gourmet Corps reveal the secrets behind their desperate desire for the Jewel Meat.

24.title: The Moment of Truth! Setsuno's Century Soup!
24.plot: Komatsu and Toriko are treated to an ultra-exclusive tour of Setsuno's kitchen, including the top secret area where she prepares Century Soup. Inspired, they set off in search of the genuine article, but trouble lies ahead.

25.title: Meeting at the Saloon! The Powerful and Numerous Gourmet Hunters!
25.plot: Toriko, Komatsu, and a ravenous army of Gourmet Hunters set off in search of the legendary Century Soup. Their journey will take them to Ice Hell, but they'll have to survive a Sharkrocodile attack to arrive in one piece.

26.title: The Gourtmet Hunter Troops' Challenge! Arrival in the Frigid Hell!
26.plot: Tundra Dragons and killer icicles are just a few of the obstacles standing between Toriko and the Century Soup. If the elements don't kill him, there is a mean, green, GT Robot waiting to finish the job.

27.title: Hurry While It's Hot! A Survival Race on Ice!
27.plot: Zonge stumbles upon a group of angry Growlruses, Toriko and company go head-to-head with a herd of ferocious Freezer Bison, and a villainous vice chef unleashes an army of beastly insects.

28.title: The Fiery Explosion Shakes the Iceberg!! The Masked Man's True Form!!
28.plot: Toriko and Komatsu team up to turn a deadly Silver Grizzly into a scrumptious soup. A villainous member of the Gourmet Corps is hot on their trail, but help is on the way in the form of a Heavenly King.

29.title: Glorious Bug Tamer! Tommyrod vs. Toriko
29.plot: When Toriko's hand is frozen solid during a deadly encounter with a Gourmet Corps bug tamer, the burden of collecting the Century Soup falls squarely on the small shoulders of Komatsu. Is the little chef up to such a big task?

30.title: Gratitude and Pride! Takimaru's Full-Out Corkscrew Shot!
30.plot: Toriko fights to survive a deadly swarm of insects, and Takimaru fights for his life against an unbreakable opponent. Meanwhile, Komatsu's quest to collect the Century Soup is monitored by GT Robot.

31.title: Settled! Match and Takimaru's Desperate Attacks!
31.plot: Takimaru relies on lessons from his past to settle the score with his flexible foe, and Match puts his blade to the ultimate test against an opponent clad in Crush Turtle armor.

32.title: The Gourmet Reviver and the Legendary Soup's Location!
32.plot: Toriko heats things up in a heroic attempt to end the insect onslaught. Elsewhere, Komatsu finally reaches the location of the Century Soup - only to find that there is no soup.

33.title: Head-on Fight! Fierce Battle! Toriko vs. Tommyrod!
33.plot: Komatsu learns the amazing truth about his mysterious new friend, and Toriko relies on the power of his Gourmet Cells to even the odds in his brutal showdown with Tommyrod.

34.title: Ultimate Desperation! Tommyrod's Full-Power Mode Explodes!
34.plot: Toriko attempts to end his epic battle with Tommyrod by unleashing a Thirteen-Hit Nail Punch, but the bug tamer counters by revealing the true depths of his devious strength.

35.title: Wondrous Power! Gourmet Reviver Teppei Joins the Battle!
35.plot: The sudden arrival of a powerful Gourmet Reviver prompts Tommyrod to shed his skin, giving birth to a monstrous Parasite Emperor. The buggy beast is big and bad, but will he survive a bout with Hellboros, the ruler of Ice Hell?

36.title: The Last Drop! Who Will Get the Century Soup?!
36.plot: Komatsu was sad, failing to capture the Century Soup but Teppei has one more amazing trick up his sleeve. With evil forces bearing down on them, will any of our heroes live to tell of their adventure?.

37.title: Farewell, Ice Hell! Granny Setsu's Hidden Power!
37.plot: After being rescued by Granny Setsu, the weary and wounded adventurers set a course for the healing country known as Life. Toriko has an arm to regenerate, and Komatsu is eager to recreate the Century Soup.

38.title: Splendid Healing! Here Comes the Gourmet Reviver, Yosaku!
38.plot: Toriko's gang arrives in the healing country of Life, an amazing land of curative creatures that can treat almost any ailment. After a chance meeting with Sani, the group visits Teppei's master, a renowned - and rowdy - Reviver.

39.title: Race to Finish! Will It Be Toriko's Recovery, or Komatsu's Soup?!
39.plot: Toriko's recovery progresses faster than expected, but the strain of growing a new arm may cost him his life. Meanwhile, Komatsu struggles to find the final ingredient for his Century Soup.

40.title: To the World of Ultimate Bliss! Taste the Century Soup!
40.plot: With the help of an unusual ingredient, Komatsu finally completes the Century Soup. Thanks to the little chef's big accomplishment, Toriko may get his arm back, and add an ingredient to his Full Course Menu of Life.

41.title: Housewarming Party! Everyone Gather at the Sweets House!
41.plot: Toriko needs to build a new candy house and contracts an architect named Smile to do so.

42.title: The Gourmet King Championship! Search for the Ultimate Sweets!
42.plot: Toriko, Sani, and Coco set out on a death-defying quest to see who can track down the most irresistible sweets for a starving Seven-Color Nessie.

43.title: Bonding Dish! Partners Are Forever!
43.plot: Sharkbox Turtles, Honey Dragons, and a Chomp Urchin plague the Heavenly Kings in their mission to feed the Seven-Color Nessie. Can they survive this perilous quest and satisfy the starving beast?

44.title: White Hot! Toriko vs. The IGO President!
44.plot: Toriko tests out his new battle techniques - and his brand new arm - in a ferocious fistfight with the IGO President. Though his strength has improved, Toriko will need more training before he's ready for the Gourmet World.

45.title: Vegetable Garden in the Heavens! Vegetable Sky!
45.plot: Toriko begins his training with a mission to collect the delicious Ozone Grass. Komatsu is along for the ride, but is the little chef ready for brutal battles against Flying Sea Lions, Air Gorillas, and a Killer Bean Tree!?

46.title: Discovery! The King of Vegetables, Ozone Grass!
46.plot: Toriko and Komatsu continue their quest to collect the Ozone Grass, but their journey only grows more difficult. Before they arrive at the garden in the sky, they must pass through a deadly thunderstorm.

47.title: Confession in the Heavens! The Formation of the Invincible Duo!
47.plot: Toriko and Komatsu finally reach the Ozone Grass, but the legendary ingredient proves challenging to harvest. As the culinary adventurers struggle to satisfy their appetites, something sinister watches the scene unfold.

48.title: Shocking Encounter! A Mysterious Life Form Appears!
48.plot: Before completing their mission to capture the Ozone Grass, Toriko and Komatsu encounter an unusual beast that's identical to a GT Robot. What is this new menace, and what does it want?

49.title: Toriko Rushes in! The Truth of the Gourmet World!
49.plot: Eager to test his new abilities in the Gourmet World, Toriko ignores the warnings of his closest friends and goes in search of adventure. Meanwhile, Komatsu is shocked by an unexpected visitor.

50.title: Enter the Astounding Ringer! The True Meaning of a Partner!
50.plot: Toriko's expedition into the Gourmet World proves more dangerous than he expected, but luckily, someone back home is looking out for him. Will it be enough to keep him alive?

51.title: The Reunion of Toriko and Luffy! Find the Seafood Fruit!
51.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

52.title: Shock! The Broken Kitchen Knife and Cutler Melk!
52.plot: When Komatsu breaks his favorite knife, he and Toriko set out to find a famed craftsman who is said to forge the strongest blades imaginable. Their journey - plagued by Rock Wolves and Scale Kongs - will not be easy.

53.title: Tension! Toriko's Knife vs. Melk's Kitchen Knife!
53.plot: Toriko and Komatsu are shocked by who they find waiting at the home of Cutler Melk, and the legendary Gourmet Hunter's brash nature quickly leads to a knife fight.

54.title: Supergravity! Conquer Heavy Hole!
54.plot: Komatsu spends some quality time with Cutler Melk's apprentice, and Toriko delves deeper into the depths of Heavy Hole, where the gravity is intense and the Barbamoths are fierce.

55.title: Hidden Truth! The First Melk Appears!
55.plot: The intense gravity of Heavy Hole pushes Toriko's body to the breaking point. Back on the surface, Komatsu makes a shocking discovery about Culter Melk's apprentice.

56.title: Debut! The Second Generation's Succession and Melk Stardust!
56.plot: Toriko delves into the various mysteries of Cutler Melk, including his unusual voice, and Komatsu uses his culinary skills to give Melk's apprentice a confidence boost.

57.title: A Work Made with All Her Might! The Completed Melk Knife!
57.plot: While Melk's apprentice works tirelessly to craft a special knife for Komatsu, the little chef and Toriko wait eagerly for the job to be finished - and the feast to begin.

58.title: Super Celeb! Once in a Lifetime Gourmet Carriage Journey!
58.plot: Toriko and Komatsu take a trip on the luxurious Gourmet Carriage, but there's more to this vacation than sight-seeing and fine food. The adventurous duo is headed for the gates of hell.

59.title: Finally, He Appears! The Last of the Four Kings, Zebra!
59.plot: Toriko and Komatsu explore the despicable depths of Honey Prison as they make their way to the one called Zebra. Dare they hope to survive such a deafening encounter!?

60.title: Unleash the Roar! The Release of the Condemned Criminal, Zebra!
60.plot: The one they call Zebra is released from prison just in time for Monster Season and a showdown with the horrifying Forrest Goblin. After he eats lunch, of course.

61.title: Warning Issued! Zebra Lands on Sand Garden!
61.plot: Komatsu voices his concerns about travelling with such a dangerous criminal, and Zebra makes some new friends after a slugfest with a savage scorpion.

62.title: Komatsu's Disappearance! The Desert Labyrinth of Evil!
62.plot: A dangerous encounter with Desert Sharks leads to Komatsu's disappearance, which leads Toriko and Zebra to the foot of the Gourmet Pyramid.

63.title: The Sealed Voice! The Other-Dimensional Gourmet Pyramid!
63.plot: Komatsu is trapped within the labyrinthine Gourmet Pyramid, and only Zebra and Toriko can save him. Unfortunately, a deadly Gorgonclops and a hideous Unicorn Cerberus are standing in their way.

64.title: Astounding! The Mysterious Ancient Manuscript and the Creature Inside the Coffin!
64.plot: Zebra and Toriko must eat everything in their path in order to regain the strength needed for their daring rescue mission. Meanwhile, Komatsu struggles to survive on his own.

65.title: Shocking Showdown! Salamander Sphinx!
65.plot: Zebra and Toriko finally reunite with Komatsu, but their troubles are only just beginning. To acquire the Mellow Cola, they must defeat a ferocious Salamander Sphinx, but they have no idea how to kill it.

66.title: Cooperative Cooking! Komatsu Steers Toriko and Zebra!
66.plot: Zebra and Toriko carry out Komatsu's brutal orders as the little chef tells them exactly how to harvest the Mellow Cola. Their mission is on the verge of success when an unseen evil emerges.

67.title: Explosion of Combination Techniques! Taking the World's Best Cola!
67.plot: Toriko and Zebra must work together to defeat the mysterious monster that attacked Komatsu. There's just one problem: the two warriors are completely out of energy.

68.title: The Truth Revealed! Komatsu's Will and the Identity of the Mysterious Creature!
68.plot: Komatsu must find the courage to stand up to Zebra and tell the truth about who he wants to be his partner. Later, the horrifying identity of the mysterious monster from the Gourmet Pyramid is finally revealed.

69.title: Surpass Dad! Midsummer Gobbling Katsu Curry!
69.plot: Toriko's trip to the beach turns into an adventure when he agrees to help his favorite curry shop track down some much needed - and very dangerous - ingredients. First on the list: Water Tiger.

70.title: Connecting Bonds! The Superb Gatsugatsu Curry!
70.plot: Toriko continues his heated battle with powerful Water Tiger, and Komatsu helps a heartbroken chef find the amazing curry cooking skills locked inside him.

71.title: A New Stage! Toriko's Determination and the Return of "Him"!
71.plot: Toriko's quest to get stronger leads the dynamic culinary duo to a remote cafe in the middle of a jet black lake. The food is fantastic, but the clientele is deadly.

72.title: A Flowing Food Luck! The Pilgrimage Gourmet Shrine!
72.plot: Toriko and Komatsu visit the legendary Gourmet Shrine where they seek to increase their food luck. After sampling many delicacies and taking in the sights, Komatsu takes center stage for a surprising feat of strength.

73.title: Uwaaa! The Astonishing Surprise Apple!
73.plot: Toriko and Komatsu hope to have the element of surprise on their side as they travel to the explosive Surprise Island in search of the legendary Surprise Apple.

74.title: Chicken Beast's Egg! The Memories of Old Man Yocchi and His Wife!
74.plot: After his recent lottery win, Komatsu wants to buy Toriko a gift. There's just one problem. The legendary gourmet hunter has his heart set on a priceless piece of land where the Chicken Beast lays its eggs.

75.title: Glittering Crystal! Shining Gourami!
75.plot: Toriko, Komatsu, and Sani embark on a hair-raising quest to track down the Shining Gourami, an extremely rare sea creature that lives deep within Death Falls.

76.title: Shocking Rapids! Giant Waterfall, Death Falls!
76.plot: As the quest for the Shining Gourami continues, Toriko grows more and more impressed with Sani's training. An unexpected battle with a Hippo Shark gives the rainbow-haired gourmet hunter a chance to show off his strength.

77.title: Sani's New Attack! The Result of Gorgeous Training!
77.plot: The devastating power of Death Falls sends Sani into a flashback where he reflects on the days spent battling beasts and honing his instincts on the Road of Three Hells.

78.title: Thirty Times Combo! Thirty-Six-Fold Twin Spiked Punch!
78.plot: Toriko and Sani must team up for a powerful combination move that's their only hope for surviving the journey through Death Falls. But even if they reach the other side, they'll need help to capture their prey.

79.title: Cooking by Intuition! Komatsu and the Shining Gourami!
79.plot: Komatsu takes center stage as the little chef struggles to unlock the secret to preparing the Shining Gourami. Toriko and Sani are exhausted and hungry, and Komatsu must listen to his ingredients if he wants to feed his friends.

80.title: Flashy Presentation! Supreme Service with a Meal!
80.plot: When Melk the Second needs help finishing a very special knife, Toriko and Komatsu compete in a prestigious competition in an attempt to win the final ingredient needed to complete her project.

81.title: Supreme Chitose Ame! Komatsu and Yun's Tale!
81.plot: Toriko and Komatsu are summoned to the Gourmet Temple to help the priests and staff in creating a very special candy but during the whole process of the two assisting the Temple Priests in making and finding the special ingredient for the creation of this candy, Yun who has hitched along with Toriko and Komatsu ends up going missing making Komatsu try and search for the baby Wall Penguin before something happens to him.

82.title: Assemble on Autumn Mountain! Terry, Yun, Kiss, Queen
82.plot: Toriko, Komatsu, Yun and Terry all work with Sani and Coco, who, along with their own animal partners, each hunt for a very special ingredient and end up finding a surprise along the way.

83.title: Reunion! Take-chan of Fairytale Castle
83.plot: A sinister force is abducting the top chefs in the world, and an old friend of Komatsu's may be in great danger. Elsewhere, Toriko and Coco attempt to capture a rare appetizer.

84.title: Crossroads! A Chef's Destination
84.plot: Komatsu is shocked by the lack of culinary honor exhibited by his old friend. Meanwhile, Toriko and Coco team up to open a giant treasure chest - but what they find inside leaves them baffled.

85.title: Dramatic Transformation! Hair Salon Barber Gourmet
85.plot: Toriko and Komatsu reunite for some much needed rest and relaxation at a gourmet barber shop. The food is superb, but their hair may never recover.

86.title: Gathering of the Four Kings! A Midwinter Night's Miracle
86.plot: Toriko, Sani, Coco, and Komatsu brave frigid temperatures and Bison Frogs as they search for a legendary tree that's entirely edible.

87.title: Merry Feastmas! Gourmet Santa's Presen
87.plot: Chief recruits Toriko and the whole gang to help spread tasty Christmas cheer to hungry kids across the world. Even Zebra manages a good deed by mistake, and the holiday ends with a delicious miracle.

88.title: Heaven or Hell!? Storming Into the Gourmet Casino
88.plot: Toriko, Komatsu, and Coco venture into the Pleasure Zone on quest to track down some extremely rare Meteor Garlic, but they soon cross paths with an old friend who could use their help.

89.title: Appearance! The Boss of the Underground Cooking World, Livebearer!
89.plot: Toriko and the gang make a splash at the casino as they attempt to win enough cash and ingredients to gain admittance to the VIP area, but what lies ahead could prove deadly.

90.title: A Card Game with Your Life on the Line! Gourmet Tasting
90.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

91.title: Dead Heat! Coco vs. Livebeare
91.plot: Coco and Livebearer continue their epic showdown, but Toriko does most of the heavy lifting, devouring a mountain of pudding and handful of acorns as hard as bullets.

92.title: Coco's Strategy! The Big-Miss Cards That Determine the Outcome
92.plot: The deadly game unfolding between Coco and Livebearer reaches an unprecedented level of danger as Toriko must face off against a fearsome Hanya Panda to avoid the agony of defeat.

93.title: Eat or be Eaten! Toriko vs. the Hannya Panda
93.plot: Toriko's slug fest with the Hanya Panda proves to be more brutal than expected, and even if he survives, the difference between victory and defeat may ultimately lie with Komatsu.

94.title: Climax! The Remaining Worst Ingredients
94.plot: Toriko keeps his team in the game by surviving mouthfuls of Shock Lemons and Nitro Cherries, but if Livebearer can withstand a bite of poison potato - all will be lost.

95.title: The Decisive Moment! Coco's Grand Scenario
95.plot: Coco explains his entire plan, while Livebearer cuts his pain sense and coats his intestines, but, because of Coco's plan, the coating is eaten by microbes and the casino room is transformed into a battle zone between Coco, Toriko, Komatsu, Match and his goons, and Livebearer with his goons on the other side.

96.title: A Taste That's Out of This World! The Actual Eating of the Meteor Garlic
96.plot: Komatsu gets help preparing the Meteor Garlic from a very unexpected source, and Granny Setsu is paid a visit by the IGO.

97.title: Pinnacle Showdown! Ichiryuu vs. The Bishokukai's Midora
97.plot: Toriko searches for more training ingredients, Komatsu impresses his boss with dazzling new cooking techniques, and Ichiryuu comes face-to-face with an old nemesis.

98.title: The Hidden Training Ingredient! Emergency Instructions from Ichiryuu
98.plot: Before beginning the search for his next training ingredient, Toriko must defeat a ferocious Devil Planet Horse and then dine with a fortune telling sushi chef.

99.title: Run, Strongest Army! Toriko, Luffy, Goku
99.plot: A cross-over special with One Piece and Dragon Ball Z. The IGO is hosting a World's Best Eating Tournament, a merciless race with no rules, on a certain island. The tournament's championship prize is the luxuriously rare Carat Sizzled Cattle. Toriko and his friends are aiming for the championship, Luffy and his Straw Hat Crew is set to participate in the event as well, and Son Goku and his friends are also contestants. The showdown may determine the strongest of the three franchises' leads.

100.title: Commemorating the Hundredth Episode, All Four Heavenly Kings Assemble
100.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

101.title: Toriko Fainting in Agony?! Capture the World's Smelliest Ingredient
101.plot: Toriko and Komatsu set off for the Heavy Drinker Archipelago to seek out the King Vinegar. Then they must go after the most foul-smelling ingredient on the planet, the Dodurian Bomb.

102.title: Too Huge! With Pro Wrestling Moves, the Completion of the Ehou Maki
102.plot: Toriko and Komatsu visit an old friend who might be able to help them gather the seaweed they need to complete their epic Fortune Roll.

103.title: Hands Together and Bow! Gourmet Human National Treasure Chin Chinchin Appears
103.plot: Toriko and Komatsu try to eat their way to destiny by devouring Monchy's Fortune Roll, but they soon get distracted by a vanishing restaurant where they meet the Master of the legendary Chourin temple and one of the only 4 national Gourmet treasures Chin Chinchin.

104.title: Those Without Gratitude Should Not Enter! The Fearsome Shokurin Temple
104.plot: The legendary Chourin Temple holds the ingredient sought by Toriko and Komatsu, but the adventurous eaters might not be ready for the teachings of the temple's Master.

105.title: Toriko, Completely Defeated?! The Delicate and Uninhibited Power of Food Honor
105.plot: Toriko's quest to attain the elusive Bubble Fruit hits a snag when he must fight a surprisingly formidable foe. If the gourmet hunter wants to complete his quest, he must learn to honor the food.

106.title: It's All About Appreciation! The Essentials of Food Honor
106.plot: Before they can truly honor the food, Toriko and Komatsu must master the art of gratitude by completing a series of tasks that prove far more difficult than originally expected.

107.title: An Approaching Threat! Hurry, Toriko! The Road to the Bubble Fruits
107.plot: Toriko and Komatsu have finished their training of Food Honor, thus they gain an enhancement in their abilities. Master Chin takes Toriko to the Bubble Way for his final challenge in order to reclaim the Bubble Fruit. Meanwhile at Shokurin Temple, Chiyo arrives in an undead beast with an intimidating aura to everyone's surprise.

108.title: Tradgedy! The Demise of Shokurin Temple... Farewell Komatsu
108.plot: Toriko pushes himself to the breaking point on his hunt for the Bubble Fruit, and a Bishokukai raiding party wreaks havoc at Chowlin Temple.

109.title: Mighty and Unrivaled! One Who Has Mastered Food Honor
109.plot: Toriko uses his new technique - and the strength he gained by eating the Bubble Fruit - to easily destroy a giant green monster, but the Master of Chowlin Temple may not be so lucky.

110.title: One-Swing 100 Million Yen Techniques! Toriko VS Granny Chiyo
110.plot: Toriko shows off an awesome array of powerful new techniques in his battle with Granny Chiyo, but the arrival of a mysterious and terrifying GT Robot puts their bout on hold.

111.title: Phantom Ingredient "CENTER", Ichiryuu's Strongest Biotope 0
111.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

112.title: The Legendary Bee "Infinity Bee", Toriko vs New Type GT Robo
112.plot: Toriko and Komatsu are sent to search for Golden Wheat, but their mission is interrupted by the arrival of a terrifying and powerful new GT Robo.

113.title: Showing His True Strength! Komatsu's Food Honor the Actual Food! The Phantasmal Noodles, "Zenmen"
113.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

114.title: The Four Heavenly Kings Gather! The Gourmet World Beasts the "Four Beast" Awaken
114.plot: The Four Heavenly Kings share a mega meal together, Komatsu learns the secret to preparing Bubble Fruit, and the human world braces for the arrival of the Four-Beasts.

115.title: The Battle to Determine the Fate of Mankind! The Four Beasts VS the Four Heavenly Kings
115.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

116.title: Toriko, Coco, Sani, Zebra The Four Heavenly Kings' Storm of Attacks
116.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

117.title: Toriko's New Crisis the Creeping Four Beast's Main Body
117.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

118.title: The Four Beast's Shockng Union and the Green Rain
118.plot: While Toriko, Coco, Sani, and Zebra battle the monstrous Four-Beasts, Komatsu rushes to make an edible antidote to the toxic Green Rain that's drenching the city.

119.title: The Four Heavenly Kings' Worst Dilemma! Komatsu's Determination
119.plot: The Four Kings' battle against the Four-Beasts proves tougher than expected, and Komatsu tries desperately to speed up the process of making medicinal munchies.

120.title: Save Mankind with Your Miraculous Food Luck
120.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

121.title: Explode! Curiosity for Taste! The Four Heavenly Kings' Combination Technique
121.plot: The Four Kings hover on the verge of death until they recall a powerful technique from their training days - turning appetite into punching power.

122.title: Ultimate Technique "Dinner of the Kings"
122.plot: Teppei tracks down a mysterious stranger who may be responsible for the rampaging beast, and the Four Kings look to end the battle with their ultimate technique.

123.title: The Forthcoming Festival the Wriggling "Dangerous Guys"
123.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

124.title: Toriko VS Gourmet World Monster Monplant""
124.plot: Toriko battles a Plant Beast from the Gourmet World, Komatsu worries about his performance in a famous cooking festival, and Coco gambles for information.

125.title: Toriko's New Technique "Nail Gun"
125.plot: Toriko must come up with some new moves to defeat the Mon Plan, Komatsu worries about the upcoming cooking festival, and Zebra returns to the home of Mellow Cola.

126.title: Great Imminent Troubles!? Cooking Fest Opens
126.plot: Audiences applaud wildly as Komatsu and the Four Kings arrive at the legendary Cooking Fest, but somewhere deep in the darkness, a powerful evil prepares to attack.

127.title: Komatsu in Trouble!? Triathlon Cooking
127.plot: Komatsu is intimidated by the competition at the cooking festival, but he's got even bigger things to worry about: a grueling test of strength known as Triathlon Cooking.

128.title: Cooking Legend, Meet Tengu Buranch
128.plot: The chefs in the top ranks capture the high quality ingredients. Elsewhere, Komatsu meets Buranchi. Amazed by his Food Luck he helps Komatsu take the remaining ingredients.

129.title: Sneaky! Stormy! Buranchi, Pulling Ahead
129.plot: Giraffe Birds and Sand Hamsters make their presence felt, Komatsu catches a lift with Brunch, and Triathlon Cooking kicks into high gear.

130.title: Life or Death, Scale Death Cooking
130.plot: Komatsu must reach the next round of the Cooking Fest without the help of his special Melk knife, but advancing could send the little chef headed toward a fiery fate.

131.title: Who Is the Strongest Combo? Entire Island Cooking
131.plot: Komatsu advances in the Cooking Fest, only to find out that his next challenge will be to cook an entire island. He recruits Toriko to help him out, but with the other Heavenly Kings cooking as well, the competition is anyone's game.

132.title: Outbreak of War! Bishokukai's Furious All-out Attack
132.plot: Komatsu's preparations for the next round of the Cooking Fest are interrupted by an old friend. Meanwhile, Toriko and the rest of the Four Kings brace for the arrival of evil.

133.title: Protect Komatsu! Toriko vs. Starjun
133.plot: When Komatsu's life is threatened, Coco, Zebra, and Sunny spring into action to defend the little chef, but the main attraction is a brutal showdown between Toriko and Starjun.

134.title: Wild Battle! Toriko's Strongest Attack
134.plot: Toriko pulls no punches in his slugfest with Starjun, Rin wages her own unique brand of war, and an army of chefs give the Gourmet Corp. more than they bargained for.

135.title: Top Showdown! IGO vs. Bishokukai
135.plot: The epic battle at Cooking Stadium rages on as Toriko and Starjun continue to throw down. If Toriko's going to be triumphant, he's can't pull any knife-and-fork punches.

136.title: The Terrible Trump Card! The Gourmet World Monsters, the "Nitro"
136.plot: The IGO's chances for victory take a serious hit when the Gourmet Corp. unleashes the horrifying monsters Nitro and the Scum Beasts.

137.title: Struggle to the Death! Coco vs. Grinpatch
137.plot: Thanks to Komatsu's super culinary skills, Coco and Toriko have the strength to carry on their battles with two of the Bishokukai's most powerful monsters.

138.title: Duel! Sunny vs. Tommyrod
138.plot: Sunny puts his heroic hair to the ultimate test in a bombastic battle with Tommyrod and his grotesque army of deadly insects.

139.title: The Moment of Conclusion! Sunny's Final Power
139.plot: Sunny's bloody battle with Tommyrod reaches its horrific end, and Brunch finds himself locked in an electrifying battle with an immortal warrior that cannot be destroyed.

140.title: Counterattack! Zebra Gets Moving
140.plot: Zebra evens the odds by unleashing the furious power of his voice, Setsuno tangles with an old rival, and Komatsu is shocked to find Toriko on the losing end of a battle.

141.title: Toriko, Counterattack! Ultimate Routine
141.plot: Komatsu's heartbroken wailing helps revive a battered Toriko, who suddenly unleashes a devastating attack that harnesses the power of a great warrior's imagination.

142.title: History's Greatest Enemy! Joa Appears
142.plot: Toriko's awesomely destructive battle with Starjun is interrupted by the arrival of Joa, an unbelievably deadly adversary who has the power to turn good into evil.

143.title: Shock! The True Identity of the Mastermind "Joa"
143.plot: After the legendary Knocking Master Jiro unmasks the terrifying evil before them, his life is endangered by his affection for Granny Setsuno. Will Toriko arrive in time to save them both!?

144.title: The Beginning of the End! Toriko vs. Joa
144.plot: Toriko and Starjun forge an unlikely alliance to save Komatsu from a deadly adversary, and a riveting flashback reveals the tragic story of Frohze the God Chef.

145.title: An Attack to Come Back from Hopelessness! The Four Heavenly Kings, the Ultimate Technique
145.plot: While Teppei and Jiro go toe-to-toe, the Four Heavenly Kings fight together to survive their battle with Joa, and the evil masterminds behind NEO reveal their devious plan.

146.title: Reach Him, Komatsu's Yells! Toriko Awakens
146.plot:

147.title: Toriko and Komatsu, Setting Out on a New Journey

imdb.title: Toriko
plot: A master chef travels the world in search of ingredients to make fantastic dishes.::Anonymous
